comments:
Build ID: I20070621-1340

Steps To Reproduce:
1. When I do a WrapInCdaAndSubmitDocument in the OHF Bridge for a XDS.b RHIO, I'm getting an error on the Bridge side. 
 
The following is the error from the tomcat log.

More information:

Created an attachment (id=84745)
Bundle with proposed fix for 212217

Looks like this is being caused by a small typo.  Please replace the org.eclipse.ohf.bridge.ihe bundle in your Bridge installation path with the file I have attached, try again, and verify this is the fix.

Works fine. Thanks. 
Will the fix be in the next build?
New build will be out later today.
